text_block_list.text: A few days have passed since I became Seiun Sky's trainer. However…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, Trainer-san, have you heard! There's gonna be a nice tide coming in today! And you know what that means, right? This is the perfect day to go fishing!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Are you seriously asking me about that? Hmm, well, I'll pass.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Cause Sei-chan feels like working on her wrist snap rather than her footwork today. So how about we train tomorrow instead?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wowie, we talked about "Cat Paradise: Nyancardia Project" for so long! We were so absorbed in our conversation that we both lost track of time.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hmm? You seem like you want to say "but I wanted to discuss training…" Was it my imagination…? Yup, it must've been!
Eh? You came here looking for Sei-chan? Well that's really unfortunate… She just left a little while ago.
Despite being put in charge of Seiun Sky, I have yet to actually train with her.
Does she have no drive to improve and win races…?
If that's the case, why am I even here? I walked around the academy as I pondered this question.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmph. So it seems that the rumors about a rookie trainer being manipulated were true.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Remembering me in that manner is quite irritating, so make sure to correct it! I am King Halo, the elite Uma Musume. I shall also grant you the right to address me with "sama!"

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Anyways… Haa… From the looks of it, it really does seem like she's manipulating you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I was hoping to get some valuable information on Sky-san from you to develop a strategy, but… this was a complete waste! As it stands, it'll happen all over again… Ah, jeez!
choice_data_list: Is Seiun Sky really that fast?
Is Seiun Sky really that fast?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Haa!? When it comes to speed, she's…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmph…! Instead of asking me about these things, why not see for yourself!?
The next day, I asked if I could sit in on Seiun Sky's class. And what I saw was…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So the mock race is finally here, huh?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Don't talk about this race in that manner! After all, today will be the day that you finally realize just how great I am! Ohohoho!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: But I already know how great you are though? You really are an elite Uma Musume. King, you're really amazing.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: It doesn't feel like you mean what you're saying!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmph, today will be the last day that you take that attitude with me! Because today… Today I will thoroughly mark you, and defeat you!!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Thoroughly mark me, huh? Oh no… How scary.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sei-chan and King-chan are getting fired up… But I'm not planning on losing either…!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Eh, I wonder if Sky-san is someone we should be wary of… Have you heard any rumors about her that have stood out?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Rumors that stood out? Well I've been hearing a pretty bad one lately. Apparently, she skips out on training everyday.
(Thunk!!)
Thus the mock race began. The first one to take the lead was…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Haa… Haa… Eh!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Huh? King-san is in the lead!? Wasn't Sky-san a "front runner" type that takes the lead as quickly as possible…?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Maybe she's lost a lot of her physical strength and can't make it to the front of the pack since she's been skipping out on training… or something? I've heard that that happens a lot.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Haa… Haa… Ugh, my legs…!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmph, I heard that you've been slacking off lately, but I didn't realize just how far gone you truly were! I was an idiot for being overly cautious of you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: This will be fine. I did not expect it, but adapting to these types of situations is what makes me an elite Uma Musume As long as I continue to extend this lead…!
Due to Seiun Sky's late start, King Halo gave up on her mark and took a huge lead instead. The race continued in this manner until…
During the final stretch, King Halo's pace started to gradually decline…!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Nghh…! My stamina is…!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: To be fair, you're better as a "stalker", King. It would've been a real problem had you stayed behind me, marked me, and overtook me in the final stretch.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: But this was exactly the opening I was waiting for…!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Wai- Huh!? Sky-san!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Eh, Sky-san took the lead!? You're joking! When did that even happen!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: But she seemed like she was rusty from lack of training… Wait, don't tell me… Was this her plan all along!?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Great, they fell for it! Now all I need to do is…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: This… This match isn't over yet!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh…!?
Special Week ended up coming in 1st, with Seiun Sky a very close 2nd.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: She closed in on me and dropped me to 2nd, huh? Spe-chan's explosive power is really something…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
choice_data_list: You did great out there too
You did great out there too

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: But I came in 2nd.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: My tricks, my preparations, they weren't enough to get me the win.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wait wha!? Trainer-san!? You were here? Since when? You can't just do that, if you're here you've gotta properly tell me!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me. Since we haven't been seeing each other at training, have you gotten lonely? Ahh, being this popular's really tough!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: But you'll have to wait on getting an autograph. I'm exhausted, so I'm going to take a nap. Toodaloo.
After saying that, Seiun Sky quickly left the track…
